title: Vardaniya, Beti Ek Vardaan
overview: Pyari is no ordinary girl. On the eve of a cycling competition, she experiences her first period and is unable to participate as her mother is too poor to spend money on sanitary pads. Unwilling to miss out on lifeâ€™s experiences, Pyari uses her creativity to make a sanitary pad only to be ostracised by society and forced to conform.
